name: Additional identifier
publisher: HL7 International - Orders and Observations WG
description: This extension is used when there are multiple observation identifiers for a single observation .  The Observation.identifier is the first identifier for this observation and any additional identifiers will go here.

element.formal: This extension is used when there are multiple observation identifiers for a single observation .  The Observation.identifier is the first identifier for this observation and any additional identifiers will go here.
